EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering your interest in Step Forward!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering your interest!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
You have taken the first steps towards securing your future. Step Forward is a 12 month programme for motivated, determined and adaptable individuals. We welcome applications if you are committed to a full time work placement between August and September the following year.
Please log in Here using your email address and pin/password below to make an application.
Email: {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate_StepFwd_email__c}
Pin: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c}
Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
If you are selected onto Step Forward we will provide you with invaluable work experience, personal and professional development training and a qualification that will set you apart from your peers, make you more employable and help you to launch your career in the future.
Those who are selected and graduate from Step Forward will have:
completed 12 months of full time work with a high quality employer received a salary of £9,000 a nationally recognised qualification equivalent to an A-level developed essential skills that employers look for such as teamwork, leadership and problem solving received support from their own professional mentor to get the most of the year and beyond shared their experience with other like minded people and formed lasting friendships​
Make sure that you don't miss out and secure your future today.
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
Best of luck with your application, and we hope to see you at the Step Forward assessment!
Step Forward
WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM
